title: France Adopts a Budget After Months of Turmoil
summary_full: Prime Minister Sébastien Lecornu’s budget, subjected to judicial review, paves the way for relative political stability.
summary_public: Prime Minister Sébastien Lecornu’s budget, subjected to judicial review, paves the way for relative political stability.

FR.label: positive
